rooms.description: Large open space with foyer, near main entrance. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one side to bring natural light.
Spacious living area connected to the home theater. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning with the cardinal direction for energy flow.
Dedicated entertainment space integrated into living room. Equipped with high-end audiovisual systems, ambient lighting, and comfortable seating.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for social gatherings; integrates floor-to-ceiling windows providing a view of the garden.
Functional modern kitchen with work triangle design. Placed in optimal position as per Vastu norms for good energy and functionality.
Private bathroom adjoining the master bedroom (or living room on ground floor) if required. Designed for convenience.

openings.description: Large door with reinforced glass to ensure security and aesthetic appeal.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in living room, dining area, and entrance hall for natural light and ventilation.
